commands.sbhelper.invalidCount: The maximum count cannot be negative
commands.sbhelper.success.setMaxCount: Set max display count of scoreboard sidebar to %s
hint.scoreboard-helper.edit_score.fail.n: You shouldn't use an empty name.
The server scoreboard remained unchanged as it equals to the submitted scoreboard.
hint.scoreboard-helper.edit_score.permis: You don't have permission to modify the server scoreboard.
hint.scoreboard-helper.edit_score.succes: Successful made %s changes to server scoreboard
hint.scoreboard-helper.export.fail.inact: The scoreboard sidebar doesn't display any scoreboard objective now
hint.scoreboard-helper.export.fail.excep: An exception occurred during the save process, see log for details
hint.scoreboard-player.export.fail.no_en: There are currently no scoreboards recorded
options.scoreboard-helper.default_team_c:
Automatically use /teammsg command to send a team message when sending a chat message.
When enabled, you can send a normal message by adding a single '#' at the beginning.
When you aren't in a team, it will send a normal message.
Default: OFF
options.scoreboard-helper.export.title: Export Scoreboard to CSV File
options.scoreboard-helper.title: Scoreboard Helper Config
options.scoreboard-helper.max_show_count:
Control the number of player scores that can be displayed on the scoreboard sidebar each time.
Default: 15
options.scoreboard-helper.score_sorting_:
Controls the sorting order of sidebar scores.
Default: By score (desc)
options.scoreboard-helper.show_scoreboar:
Controls the show/hide of the scoreboard sidebar.
Default: ON
options.scoreboard-helper.show_sidebar_s:
Controls the show/hide of the players' score(red number) of the scoreboard sidebar.
Default: ON
options.scoreboard-helper.sidebar_backgr:
Controls the background opacity of the scoreboard sidebar(excluding title).
Default: 30%

Controls the background opacity of the scoreboard sidebar title.
Default: 40%
options.scoreboard-helper.sidebar_text_o:
Controls the opacity of the scoreboard sidebar(excluding title).
Default: 100%
options.scoreboard-helper.sidebar_title_:
Controls the opacity of the title of the scoreboard sidebar.
Default: 100%
options.scoreboard-helper.sidebar_positi:
Controls the position of the scoreboard sidebar.
Default: →
options.scoreboard-helper.sidebar_y_offs:
Translate the scoreboard sidebar on the Y-axis.
Default: 0
